create

public int create(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                  java.lang.String treeLabel,
                  java.lang.String basePath,
                  java.lang.String channelLabel,
                  java.lang.String installType)
Create a Kickstart Tree (Distribution) in Satellite

Parameters:
sessionKey - User's session key.
treeLabel - Label for the new kickstart tree
basePath - path to the base/root of the kickstart tree.
channelLabel - label of channel to associate with ks tree.
installType - String label for KickstartInstallType (rhel_2.1, rhel_3, rhel_4, rhel_5, fedora_9)
Returns:
1 if successful, exception otherwise.

delete

public int delete(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                  java.lang.String treeLabel)
Delete a kickstarttree kickstartable tree and kickstart host specified.

Parameters:
sessionKey - User's session key.
treeLabel - Label for the new kickstart tree
Returns:
1 if successful, exception otherwise.

deleteTreeAndProfiles

public int deleteTreeAndProfiles(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                                 java.lang.String treeLabel)
Delete a kickstarttree and any profiles associated with this kickstart tree. WARNING: This will delete all profiles associated with this kickstart tree!

Parameters:
sessionKey - User's session key.
treeLabel - Label for the new kickstart tree
Returns:
1 if successful, exception otherwise.

update

public int update(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                  java.lang.String treeLabel,
                  java.lang.String basePath,
                  java.lang.String channelLabel,
                  java.lang.String installType)
Edit a kickstarttree. This method will not edit the label of the tree, see renameTree().

Parameters:
sessionKey - User's session key.
treeLabel - Label for the existing kickstart tree
basePath - New basepath for tree. rhn-kickstart.
channelLabel - New channel label to lookup and assign to the kickstart tree.
installType - String label for KickstartInstallType (rhel_2.1, rhel_3, rhel_4, rhel_5, fedora_9)
Returns:
1 if successful, exception otherwise.

rename

public int rename(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                  java.lang.String originalLabel,
                  java.lang.String newLabel)
Rename a kickstart tree.

Parameters:
sessionKey - User's session key.
originalLabel - Label for tree we want to edit
newLabel - to assign to tree.
Returns:
1 if successful, exception otherwise.
